-	cashshop	CashShop_Items	-1,12903:30,12904:30,12905:30,12906:30,12907:30,12908:30,13700:100,14171:90,14172:20,14085:100,12902:120,13717:10,13989:2,12080:10,12103:25,14232:15

-	cashshop	CashShop_+10_Comida	-1,608:3,12043:2,12086:1,12053:1,12064:2,12094:5,12424:3

-	cashshop	CashShop_Refine_Ticket	-1,6238:600,6239:600

prontera,155,285,3	script	Ares Cash Shop::PremiumCashShopZ	114,{
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
cutin "kafra_04",2;
mes "Aquí usted puede comprar artículos con cash points.";
mes "^ff0000100 Cash Point = 1 USD^000000";
mes "Selecciona el listado de gorros/cascos, armas, comida que quieres revisar.";
switch(select("- ^008888Equip/Headgears^000000:- Items:-^cc6600 +10 Comida^000000:- Refine Ticket:^880000Salir^000000"))
{
	case 1:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_AresH";	break;
	case 2:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Items";	break;
	case 3:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_+10_Comida";	break;
	case 4:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Refine_Ticket";	break;
	default:	close2;	cutin "",255;	end;
}
next;
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
mes "Abriendo shop...";
close2;
cutin "",255;
callshop .@shop$,0;
end;
OnInit:
OnTimer0900:
	setarray .@RoomDisplay$,"Kafra Shop","Head Gear";
	delwaitingroom;
	waitingroom .@RoomDisplay$[rand(0,2)],0;
	initnpctimer;
end;
}

prontera,150,285,5	script	Kafra Shop [Head Gear]::PremiumCashShopA	114,{
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
cutin "kafra_04",2;
mes "Selecciona el listado de gorros/cascos que quieres revisar.";
switch(select("- Lista A ^BDBDBD[100/500]^000000:- Lista B ^BDBDBD[2000/4500]^000000:- Lista C ^BDBDBD[5000/9000]^000000:- Lista D ^BDBDBD[10000/14000]^000000:- Lista E ^BDBDBD[15000/18000]^000000:- Lista F ^BDBDBD[20000/25000]^000000:^880000Salir^000000"))
{
	case 1:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearA";	break;
	case 2:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearB";	break;
	case 3:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearC";	break;
	case 4:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearD";	break;
	case 5:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearE";	break;
	case 6:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_HeadGearF";	break;
	default:	close2;	cutin "",255;	end;
}
next;
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
mes "Abriendo shop...";
close2;
cutin "",255;
callshop .@shop$,0;
end;
OnInit:
OnTimer0900:
	setarray .@RoomDisplay$,"Kafra Shop","Head Gear";
	delwaitingroom;
	waitingroom .@RoomDisplay$[rand(0,2)],0;
	initnpctimer;
end;
}

prontera,161,285,5	script	Kafra Shop [Consumibles]::PremiumCashShopB	112,{
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
cutin "kafra_06",2;
mes "Selecciona el listado de Consumibles/Misc que quieres revisar.";
switch(select("- Pociones:- Comidas:- Regalos:- Pergaminos:- Especiales:- Huevos:- Medallas BG:	^880000Salir^000000"))
{
	case 1:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Potions";	break;
	case 2:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Foods";	break;
	case 3:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_GiftBox";	break;
	case 4:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Scrolls";	break;
	case 5:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_Varios";	break;
	case 6:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_EGGs";	break;
	case 7:	set .@shop$, "CashShop_MedallasBG";	break;
	case 8: close2;	cutin "",255;	end;
	default:	close2;	cutin "",255;	end;
}
next;
mes "[^008888 Kafra Shop ^000000]";
mes "Abriendo shop...";
close2;
cutin "",255;
callshop .@shop$,0;
end;

OnInit:
OnTimer0700:
	setarray .@RoomDisplay$,"Kafra Shop","Consumibles","Especiales";
	delwaitingroom;
	waitingroom .@RoomDisplay$[rand(0,3)],0;
	initnpctimer;
end;

}
